name: Samarth Srivastava
bio:
Hi, I'm Samarth, a dedicated backend developer proficient in Golang and Node.js, with strong problem-solving skills and
effective team collaboration. Passionat

top_projects.name: car_parking_detection
top_projects.description: In this project I have used python along with opencv on a car parking video which will tell you where there is an empty space

go-grpc-graphql-microservice.summary: Recent updates to this Go-based gRPC and GraphQL microservice implementation have focused on code improvements, with a series of pushes updating various components and enhancing overall project readiness.

go-database.summary: The Go Database repository has recently seen developments with the addition of a README file and subsequent updates to provide essential documentation, taking the project further towards completion.

Srivastava-samarth.summary: Recent pushes in this personal repository have chiefly encompassed enhancements to the README file, suggesting ongoing efforts to refine the project's overall presentation and documentation.

go-postgres.summary: There have been recent updates to this Go-based Postgres implementation, with efforts focused on improving the project's documentation via README updates.

Simple-Go-grpc.summary: Recent development activities within the Simple-Go-grpc repository have been centered around the creation and addition of a README file to facilitate easier project navigation.

profile_summary:
Samarth Srivastava is a highly accomplished backend developer with a strong expertise in Golang and Node.js, leveraging his exceptional problem-solving skills to drive innovation and deliver high-quality solutions. With a proven track record of effective team collaboration, he excels in fast-paced environments where cross-functional collaboration and adaptability are paramount. As a seasoned developer, Samarth has demonstrated his technical prowess through an impressive portfolio of 52 public repositories, showcasing his capabilities in Go, C++, and JavaScript.

As a skilled developer with a passion for technology, Samarth continually seeks to expand his knowledge and expertise, staying up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in software development. With a curated professional network of peers and industry leaders, he remains committed to knowledge-sharing, best practices, and fostering a community of like-minded professionals. Through his dedication to exceptional work and relentless pursuit of improvement, Samarth positions himself as a go-to expert in backend development, delivering solutions that exceed expectations and drive business results.
